metadata.title: CVE-2023-3159 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A use after free issue was discovered in driver/firewire inoutbound_phy_packet_callback in the Linux Kernel. In this flaw a localattacker with special privilege may cause a use after free problem whenqueue_event() fails.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
